Subclasses of ZeitgeistError in li.zeitgeist.api.error
 class CreateItemError
          Container error class, thrown by upload/remote if an error occured.

          Indicates if zeitgeist found a duplicate item.

          Error during remote uploading of a URL.
 

Fields in li.zeitgeist.api.error declared as ZeitgeistError
